title: 'Very Poor Quality - Broke within a couple of months'
body: 'I have been a Sparx user for quite some years now but this is the first time I was disappointed with the quality. I bought these slippers for light use every now and then and did not question quality as I trusted the Sparx brand but it was a mistake. The product seemed okay but the quality started to give up soon after even with light use both the slippers broke within two months. Really disappointed.'

title: 'It is good but not that good'
body: Let me EXPLAIN... I bought a pair of slippers because THEY LOOK SO COOL RIGHT? They have a nice soft material, is good-looking, and are comfortable. I like the color of the design and they are very comfortable to wear. But after wearing it for several months, the material starts to deteriorate and the slippers started to take shape of my feet like any other shoes but at a bit faster rate, the color faded with time and wash... But don't worry, you can still use it

title: It's a fake product, don't buy it
body: It's a fake product..... I bought it last year and after only 2-3 months its entire sole( lower portion) has came out and once it comes out you can clearly see that it had been pasted with very few drops of permanent glue to make sure that it reaches to your home in perfect condition and once the return period is over it starts to reveal it hidden real branding......
